Load_Control_Event_Identifier.title: Event Identifier
Load_Control_Event_Identifier.description: The event identifier as a string.

Load_Control_Duration_In_Min.title: Duration In Min
Load_Control_Duration_In_Min.description: The duration of the event in minutes.

Load_Control_Criticality_Level.title: Criticality Level
Load_Control_Criticality_Level.description: The criticality of the event. The device receiving the event will react in an appropriate fashion for the device.

Load_Control_Avg_Load_AdjPct.title: Avg Load AdjPct
Load_Control_Avg_Load_AdjPct.description: Defines the maximum energy usage of the receiving device, as a percentage of the device's normal maximum energy usage.

Load_Control_Duty_Cycle.title: Duty Cycle
Load_Control_Duty_Cycle.description: Defines the duty cycle for the load control event, i.e, what percentage of time the receiving device is allowed to be on.

Load_Control_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Load_Control_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Load_Control_Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Load_Control_Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Load_Control_Fractional_Timestamp.title: Fractional Timestamp
Load_Control_Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
